text: Congratulations to Dr. Priyanka Kataria on successfully defending his PhD thesis., Nov 2024!
Congratulations to Dr. Gautam Susarla on successfully defending his PhD thesis., Nov 2024!
Congratulations to Ms. Mahima Manjunath Bhat for receiving the Best M.Sc Life Sciences Thesis Award 2024
Congratulations to Mr. Gautam Susarla for his outstanding presentation at the Colloquium, June 2024!
Congratulations to Ms. Priyanka Kataria for her outstanding presentation at the Colloquium. June 2024!
Congratulations to Prof. Patrick D'Silva on being elected as an IASc fellow for the year 2023/24.
Congratulations to Dr. Abhijit Birje for successfully defending his Ph.D. thesis.
Congratulations to Mr. Gautam Susarla for receiving the Prof. Joseph D. Padayatty Memorial Award 2023
Congratulations Ms. Aakansha Paliwal on securing the prestigious PMRF fellowship.
